thread.section_title: Mabel's Labels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mabel's Labels | mabelslabels.com
thread.title: Danielle

author: Danielle
title: Danielle
text: I was excited to give a set of labels as a gift. The website indicates that orders take 2 business days to process, and shipping takes up to 10 business days. But I ordered the labels a week ago and have yet to receive a shipping notification. I would expect to have received some sort of communication by now. At this rate, the labels will arrive too late to be of any use to the recipient. I'm hoping this is just a glitch and the labels will arrive on schedule.
